personal_information.name: Senior Database Administrator/Database Engineer
personal_information.location: East Brunswick, NJ/New York, NY/Liberty Corner, NJ

professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with extensive experience in SQL Server management, migrations, disaster recovery, and performance tuning across various financial institutions.

key_responsibilities: Installed and configured SQL Server 2008 R2
& 2000 for failover clusters.
Migrated SQL Server 2005 to 2008 R2 and 2012.
Administered and maintained SQL Server instances
including backup and recovery configurations.
Added security and privilege for users accessing database servers.
Monitored backups and synchronized non-production environments with production backups.
